price: 178. Iedereen die Allah leidt, zijn de geleiden en iedereen die Hij laat dwalen, dat zijn de verliezers.
arabic: مَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِيۖ وَمَن يُضۡلِلۡ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadī waman yuḍ'lil fa-ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
